item.name: GSKDbgNVBatteryCreate
item.help: lvl1 car battery with full energy using the charger post will let u create 2 strong NV (40 weak nv). lvl6 will be 4 strong nv.

property.name: EconomicValue
property.help: electronic parts shall not be craftable, player should not sell it, but if needs it has some value

property.name: Class
property.help: melee just to prevent player destroying it before using to craft specific object

item.name: GSKElctrnTeleportUndergroundFreeAndSafeCall
item.help: do not allow crafting as this dont use energy nor dmgs the mod. TODO: allow this only on the first game day, to prevent using it on bloodmoons.

requirement.name: PlayerLevel
requirement.help: only meant to be used just after joining

requirement.name: !IsBloodMoon
requirement.help: this is not enough, player may use it just before bloodmoon kicks in.. TODO:ISSUE?: the engine may even not spawn zombs properly if player is that far away underground?

item.name: GSKElctrnTeleportToBiomeFreeAndSafeCall
item.help: do not allow crafting as this dont use energy nor dmgs the mod.

requirement.name: PlayerLevel
requirement.help: only meant to be used just after joining

property.name: Class
property.help: to be consumed at secondary action

item.name: GSKCFGElctrnTeleportToBiome
item.help: keep it equal to GSKElctrnTeleportToBiomeFreeAndSafeCall least the 2nd action

property.name: Class
property.help: to be consumed at secondary action

append.help: there is 2 because the underground teleport may be impossible to use initially where the player was random spawned, if player is below 60 ground elevation and unable to flee enough from enemies, but these are lvl 1 use only and there is also the teleY50
